name: Nocturnal eBay Theme.
description: Minimal and easy to change the colors for, a lot of parts only show on hover, always a wip as eBay just can't stop updating.

user.name: Chloe Chantelle
user.about: Yo! I'm Chloe Chantelle, these are themes I make by either request or just using the site frequently. If you like what I do you can either donate or email me about a commission! uwu

additional_info:
26.05.17 - Fixed background color areas.
22.04.17 - Fixed small issues.
22.3.17 - Fixed page number text and bg color.
17.3.17 - Fixed eBay summary bg (html body jfc pls).
10.1.17 - Themed checkout/ordered section, fixed small problems.
3.1.17 - Fixed user header from not showing.
9.12.16 - Themed returns page.
1.12.16 - Themed more parts, fixed messages.
23.11.16 - Works on all domains, fixed small problems.
26.7.16 - Fixed not working in the cart.
18.7.16 - Fixed small problems, themed more pages.
7.7.16 - Works on all country domains, brought back recently viewed, changed item page a little.
1.7.16 - Fixed location, edit the url in the first line if you use another eBay location.
27.5.16 - Themed cart better, small areas.
25.5.16 - Fixed small problems, themed more parts.
16.4.16 - Released.

discussions.name: Search Result Pages now White + Hidden side-panel Elements No Longer Hidden
